seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Architect & Leader' with proven experience as a Data Architect and leadership expectations in a hands-on role.

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly mentions 'Data Architect' and responsibilities focus on architectural design in a Microsoft environment.

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions ownership of architectural design across a large MS environment with thousands of tables and stored procedures.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Described as a 'player-coach' role leading a small team and driving architectural design.

primary_cloud.evidence: Microsoft environment and MS Fabric mentioned explicitly.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers mentioned beyond Microsoft/Azure.

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL processes and MS Fabric mentioned, no explicit streaming tools or real-time emphasis.

orchestrator_category.evidence: MS Fabric is a cloud-native orchestration tool for Microsoft environments.

storage_layer.evidence: Large Microsoft environment implies SQL Server or Azure warehouse, while ERP integrations suggest diverse storage needs.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location explicitly states 'Remote, anywhere in the US'.

timezone_focus.evidence: Remote work allowed anywhere in the US, implying no strict timezone focus beyond US.

relocation_required.evidence: Remote work allowed anywhere in the US, no relocation signals.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of visa sponsorship in Pass 1 results.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No signals suggesting OPT/CPT or student visa support.

citizenship_required.evidence: Equal Opportunity Employer statement implies no citizenship restrictions beyond work authorization.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time, exempt position with benefits mentioned suggests W2 employment.

benefits_level.evidence: Medical, dental, vision, 401(k), and PTO mentioned (2-3 basic benefits).

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions opportunity to make a lasting impact but no specific career tracks or growth paths.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly states mentoring a small team as part of the role.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes.

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role is a 'player-coach' implying both individual contributor and management responsibilities.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Strong language around 'proven experience' and 'must have' skills with no 'nice to have' skills listed.

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focusing on data architecture and leadership in a Microsoft environment.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align with a principal-level role (e.g., leadership, hands-on architecture).
